content: mini boobie by julie ford www stitchify com for personal use only pattern cannot be distributed or used for commercial gain materials *worsted weight yarn *f hook gauge unimportant for this project finished size will be about 3 tall 2 wide 2 deep notes the chain that begins each row counts as 1 single_crochet round 1 chain 2 single_crochet into first chain 5 times join to top of beginning st 6 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 1 single_crochet in same st as joining 2 single_crochet in next st to end join to top of beginning st 12 single_crochet round 3 chain 1 1 single_crochet in same st as joining single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st around join to top of beginning st 18 single_crochet round 4 chain 1 1 single_crochet in same st as joining 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 times 12 single_crochet so far 1 single_crochet in next st around to end join to top of beginning st 21 single_crochet round 5 chain 1 1 single_crochet in same st as joining 1 single_crochet in next 3 st 2 single_crochet in next st 2 times 12 single_crochet so far 1 single_crochet in next st around to end join to top of beginning st 24 single_crochet round 6 chain 1 1sc in same st as joining 1 single_crochet in next 4 st 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st around to end join to top of beginning st 26 single_crochet round 7 chain 1 1sc in same st as joining 1 single_crochet in next 5 st 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st around to end join to top of beginning st 28 single_crochet round 8 chain 1 1sc in same st as joining 1 single_crochet in next 6 st 2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st around to end join to top of beginning st 30 single_crochet round 9 chain 1 1sc in same st as joining 1 single_crochet in next 7 st 2 single_crochet in next st 2 times 1 single_crochet in next st around to end join to top of beginning st 33 single_crochet break off yarn and weave in ends finish with nips if so desired i recommend sewing on a circle of felt and a bead here s an example of how you can elaborate on this pattern please upload your finished projects on the ravelry mini boobie pattern page - i would love to see your creation http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mini-boobie *julie a k a stitchify
